# Business/management report: health, stories, FI state, QA status, gate readiness, sync readiness

Execute the **status** workflow as a **Product Owner**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_PO.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_PO.md)

## Workflow

Generate business/management status report:
1. Count products and projects
2. Show project health (stories by status)
3. List Feature-Increment states
4. Show QA coverage status
5. Display gate readiness
6. Show sync readiness


## Output

Status report (read-only)
